input_values_schema.title: Configuration for a simple app
input_values_schema.description: The app creates a mandelbrot or julia plot

test_id.description: The ID of the foo-fighting test that this question belongs to.

max_duration.description: The maximum duration of time in seconds that should be spent calculating the Mandelbrot set.

randomise_duration.description: If `True`, the Mandelbrot set will keep being generated until a random duration of time between 0s and the maximum duration has passed.
